name: Unscented Gentleman
description: Not everyone needs a scent. The Unscented Gentleman is fine just the way he is - clean and fresh. This soap comes without added essential or fragrance oils, making it great for those with sensitive skin. Unscented Gentleman soap is available in three styles of bath bar - for average skin, extra cleansing, and extra moisturizing - or as a shave soap. Bath bars are 4-4.5 oz rectangles. Shave soaps are 2.5-3.5 oz rounds. Choose a style based on your skin's needs. You can read more about our styles and their ingredients on our soap styles page. All of our soaps are handmade in small batches using the cold-process method of soap making, and fully cured for at least 4 weeks. Handmade soap retains its natural glycerin, which is a great conditioner for the skin. Our soaps are vegan friendly and free of harsh detergents or preservatives. To maximize the lifespan of your soap, keep it stored in a cool, dry place before use, and make sure water can drain away from it so it can dry between uses.

name: Barbershop Gentleman - Bay Rum
description: Our own version of the “Bay Rum” scent, a men's classic. Bay, citrus, spice, and a touch of vanilla are reminiscent of the classic barbershop shave. Contains essential and fragrance oils. Barbershop Gentleman soap is available in three styles of bath bar - for average skin, extra cleansing, and extra moisturizing - or as a shave soap. Bath bars are 4-4.5 oz rectangles. Shave soaps are 2.5-3.5 oz rounds. Choose a style based on your skin's needs. You can read more about our styles and ingredients on our soap styles page. All of our soaps are handmade in small batches using the cold-process method of soap making, and fully cured for at least 4 weeks. Handmade soap retains its natural glycerin, which is a great conditioner for the skin. Our soaps are vegan friendly and free of harsh detergents or preservatives. To maximize the lifespan of your soap, keep it stored in a cool, dry place before use, and make sure water can drain away from it so it can dry between uses.

name: Beatnik Gentleman - Coffee and Chocolate
description: Snap your fingers to this delicious mocha scent. Coffee and more coffee combine with real cocoa for a rejuvenating soap treat. Chocolate is known for being an antioxidant and natural skin softener, while coffee absorbs body odors. Now you can have your coffee and wash with it, too. The Beatnik Gentleman soaps are dark brown and have a brown, chocolaty lather. Contains coffee, cocoa powder, and fragrance oil. Beatnik Gentleman soap is available in two styles of bath bar - for average skin and extra moisturizing - or as a shave soap. Bath bars are 4-4.5 oz rectangles. Shave soaps are 2.5-3.5 oz rounds. Choose a style based on your skin's needs. You can read more about our styles and ingredients on our soap styles page. All of our soaps are handmade in small batches using the cold-process method of soap making, and fully cured for at least 4 weeks. Handmade soap retains its natural glycerin, which is a great conditioner for the skin. Our soaps are vegan friendly and free of harsh detergents or preservatives. To maximize the lifespan of your soap, keep it stored in a cool, dry place before use, and make sure water can drain away from it so it can dry between uses.

name: Classic Gentleman - Cedar and Citrus
description: A perfect, handsome, manly blend of cedar, musk, citrus, and spice that can only be described as ‘classic’. Contains essential and fragrance oils. Classic Gentleman soap is available in three styles of bath bar - for average skin, extra cleansing, and extra moisturizing - or as a shave soap. Bath bars are 4-4.5 oz rectangles. Shave soaps are 2.5-3.5 oz rounds. Choose a style based on your skin's needs. You can read more about our styles and their ingredients on our soap styles page. All of our soaps are handmade in small batches using the cold-process method of soap making, and fully cured for at least 4 weeks. Handmade soap retains its natural glycerin, which is a great conditioner for the skin. Our soaps are vegan friendly and free of harsh detergents or preservatives. To maximize the lifespan of your soap, keep it stored in a cool, dry place before use, and make sure water can drain away from it so it can dry between uses.

name: Early Morning Gentleman - Oatmeal Soap
description:
The Early Morning Gentleman is full of real oatmeal and the scent of cinnamon with a hint of citrus. 

Oatmeal in soap is known both for its gentle exfoliating qualities and its ability to soothe dry, itchy skin. This soap includes saponified olive, coconut, palm, and castor oils, plus a healthy dose of saponified shea butter to leave your skin both clean and soft.

Each bar weighs between 4-4.5 oz.

All of our soaps are handmade in small batches using the cold-process method of soap making, and are fully cured for at least 4 weeks. Handmade soap retains its natural glycerin, which is a great conditioner for the skin.
Our soaps are vegan friendly and free of harsh detergents or preservatives.

To maximize the lifespan of your soap, keep it stored in a cool, dry place before use, and make sure water can drain away from it so it can dry between uses.

name: Flannel Gentleman - Pine Tar
description:
The Flannel Gentleman is our own version of pine tar soap. Pine tar soap is frequently used by those with skin conditions such as psoriasis, eczema, and rosacea. Handmade in the cold process method of soap making, this style includes saponified olive, coconut, palm, and castor oils, plus pine tar. This soap has a smokey, woodsy pine scent, perfect for the mountain man in flannel, or just anyone wanting their skin to feel great.

Each bar weighs between 4-4.5 oz. 

All of our soaps are handmade in small batches using the cold-process method of soap making, and are fully cured for at least 4 weeks. Handmade soap retains its natural glycerin, which is a great conditioner for the skin. 
Our soaps are vegan friendly and free of harsh detergents or preservatives. 
To maximize the lifespan of your soap, keep it stored in a cool, dry place before use, and make sure water can drain away from it so it can dry between uses.

(Disclaimer: The statements presented on this site have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. The products offered are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.)

name: Globe Trotting Gentleman - Sandalwood and Spice
description: Sandalwood and spice come together to form a scent that would be at home anywhere a pith helmet and compass lay. The Globe Trotting Gentleman combines scents of sandalwood, amber, and spice into a well-traveled and worldly blend. Contains essential and fragrance oils. Globe Trotting Gentleman soap is available in three styles of bath bar - for average skin, extra cleansing, and extra moisturizing - or as a shave soap. Bath bars are 4-4.5 oz rectangles. Shave soaps are 2.5-3.5 oz rounds. Choose a style based on your skin's needs. You can read more about our styles and their ingredients on our soap styles page. All of our soaps are handmade in small batches using the cold-process method of soap making, and fully cured for at least 4 weeks. Handmade soap retains its natural glycerin, which is a great conditioner for the skin. Our soaps are vegan friendly and free of harsh detergents or preservatives. To maximize the lifespan of your soap, keep it stored in a cool, dry place before use, and make sure water can drain away from it so it can dry between uses.

name: Old West Gentleman - Leather and Musk
description: Tough and bold, the Old West Gentleman is a masculine mix of leather and musk. Contains essential and fragrance oils. Old West Gentleman soap is available in three styles of bath bar - for average skin, extra cleansing, and extra moisturizing - or as a shave soap. Bath bars are 4-4.5 oz rectangles. Shave soaps are 2.5-3.5 oz rounds. Choose a style based on your skin's needs. You can read more about our styles and ingredients on our soap styles page. All of our soaps are handmade in small batches using the cold-process method of soap making, and fully cured for at least 4 weeks. Handmade soap retains its natural glycerin, which is a great conditioner for the skin. Our soaps are vegan friendly and free of harsh detergents or preservatives. To maximize the lifespan of your soap, keep it stored in a cool, dry place before use, and make sure water can drain away from it so it can dry between uses.

name: Solid Cologne
description:
A true gentleman doesn't hide in a cloud of overpowering scent, he keeps his scent close for himself and those close to him to enjoy.

Our solid colognes are the perfect compliment to your daily routine to keep you smelling handsome and gentlemanly all day long. Their compact 0.5 oz size makes it easy to keep a tin in your pocket, dopp kit, gym bag, or glove box. Simply rub your finger over the cologne and apply it to pulse points for a satisfying scent that lasts. 

The Barbershop Gentleman is our take on the classic bay rum men's fragrance. This scent is super spicy with a punch of citrus and a waft of soft vanilla.

The Classic Gentleman is a perfect, handsome, manly blend of cedar, musk, citrus, and spice that can only be described as ‘classic’. This scent makes us think of Humphrey Bogart and Clark Gable.

Our solid colognes are made with carnauba wax, coconut oil, sweet almond oil, and essential and fragrance oils. This combination makes them easy to apply and long lasting. Vegan friendly. Comes in a 0.5 oz. metal tin.

name: Robust Gentleman - Tea Tree and Rosemary
description: For the gentleman coming off the field or going out with the ladies, Robust Gentleman is a scent with purpose. Rosemary, tea tree oil, and grapefruit seed extract have a clean, fresh scent, and are all known for their antifungal, antimicrobial, and astringent properties. Helps remove dirt, sweat, or whatever you have on you, making it perfect for the locker room. Real rosemary in each bar has the added benefit of gentle exfoliation. Contains essential oil, crushed rosemary, and grapefruit seed extract. Robust Gentleman soap is available in three styles of bath bar - for average skin, extra cleansing, and extra moisturizing. Bath bars are 4-4.5 oz rectangles. Choose a style based on your skin's needs. You can read more about our styles and their ingredients on our soap styles page. All of our soaps are handmade in small batches using the cold-process method of soap making, and fully cured for at least 4 weeks. Handmade soap retains its natural glycerin, which is a great conditioner for the skin. Our soaps are vegan friendly and free of harsh detergents or preservatives. To maximize the lifespan of your soap, keep it stored in a cool, dry place before use, and make sure water can drain away from it so it can dry between uses.

name: Surrealist Gentleman - Absinthe and Orchid
description: For the gentleman who doesn't mind a little paint in his mustache, comes this absinthe and orchid scent. The Surrealist Gentleman is most strongly scented with anise, with a waft of orchid and a base of manly oakmoss, making it altogether quirky, artistic, and masculine. Contains essential and fragrance oils. Surrealist Gentleman soap is available in three styles of bath bar - for average skin, extra cleansing, and extra moisturizing - or as a shave soap. Bath bars are 4-4.5 oz rectangles. Shave soaps are 2.5-3.5 oz rounds. Choose a style based on your skin's needs. You can read more about our styles and their ingredients on our soap styles page. All of our soaps are handmade in small batches using the cold-process method of soap making, and fully cured for at least 4 weeks. Handmade soap retains its natural glycerin, which is a great conditioner for the skin. Our soaps are vegan friendly and free of harsh detergents or preservatives. To maximize the lifespan of your soap, keep it stored in a cool, dry place before use, and make sure water can drain away from it so it can dry between uses.

name: Culinary Gentleman - Kitchen Soap
description:
The Culinary Gentleman may want the scent of garlic and onion in the air, but certainly not on his hands. 
This soap is our version of the classic kitchen soap. Handmade in the cold process method of soap making, this style includes saponified castor, coconut, olive, and palm oils, with the addition of shea butter, coffee, coffee grounds and essential oils. The shea butter helps to keep your frequently-washed hands soft. The coffee doesn't add scent to the soap, but instead helps to remove scents and odors from your hands. Coffee grounds help to exfoliate and remove dirt, grime, and oils from your hands. One of our testers was happy to find that this soap even took pine sap off her hands. This makes The Culinary Gentleman great for the kitchen, garden, or garage! Brightly citrus scented.

Each bar weighs between 4-4.5 oz. 

All of our soaps are handmade in small batches using the cold-process method of soap making, and are fully cured for at least 4 weeks. Handmade soap retains its natural glycerin, which is a great conditioner for the skin. 
Our soaps are vegan friendly and free of harsh detergents or preservatives. 

To maximize the lifespan of your soap, keep it stored in a cool, dry place before use, and make sure water can drain away from it so it can dry between uses.

name: Old Timey Dry Skin Salve
description:
What was originally developed as a salve for new tattoos has quickly become a great go-to salve for all kinds of skin. Our testers tell us they've put this on everything - chapped hands, ashy legs, crusty feet, new tattoos, old tattoos, dry faces, itchy arms, athlete's foot, and all over their bodies like lotion. In every instance they've said they love this thick, rich salve. It's just like the kind great grandpa would've used when his hands got dry after a day of chopping wood.

Old Timey Dry Skin Salve includes calendula-infused olive oil, coconut oil, sweet almond oil, shea butter, carnauba wax, vitamin E, and tea tree oil - making it skin loving, vegan, phthalate free, and petroleum free. Each of the ingredients has been thoughtfully selected for specific skin healing and conditioning purposes. You are encouraged to do your own research to learn what these ingredients can do for your skin. 

Each amber jar contains a full 4 oz of Old Timey Dry Skin Salve. This salve melts and spreads as it warms, so a little dab goes a long way. 

Try it for yourself and find out why our testers are clamoring to get more. 

Note - Please store in a cool, dry place. Old Timey Dry Skin Salve will melt at high temperatures. If this happens, just place the jar in the fridge until it sets back up.

For external use only. Please use common sense - don't apply to open skin, use clean hands, and discontinue use if any irritation occurs. This product has not been evaluated by the FDA and is not designed to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

name: Gentleman's Aftershave
description:
Your face is what you present to the world. Make sure it's ready with a smooth shave and a splash of aftershave from The Gentleman's Soap Company. 

A good aftershave needs to accomplish a number of tasks. It must help to close pores that were opened by warm water, clean any nicks, balance pH that was thrown off by alkali shave soaps or creams, moisturize, and soothe skin. A pleasant scent is nice, too. Our aftershave contains all the ingredients to accomplish these tasks, without the harsh burn of alcohol. 

The Gentleman's Soap Company Aftershave is available in eight scents to match our bath and shave soaps.
-Unscented - contains no essential or fragrance oil
-Barbershop - bay rum
-Classic - cedar and citrus
-English - black tea, tobacco, and cherry hardwood
-Fatherly - amber, vetiver, and cardamom - Limited Edition scent
-Globe Trotting - sandalwood and spice
-Old West - leather and musk
-Surrealist - absinthe and orchid


Aftershave comes packaged in an attractive 4 oz amber bottle with black lid. 

Ingredients: filtered water, witch hazel distillate, glycerin, polysorbate 20, tocopherol, preservative (propylene glycol, diazolidinyl urea, methylparaben, propylparaben), aloe, grapefruit seed extract, essential and fragrance oils.

name: Foot and Body Scrub
description:
After a long day packed into work boots, sneakers, or left barefoot on the ground, your feet can look, feel, and smell their worst. Revive them with this salt and oil based scrub. 

This is no ladies spa day product - you won't find any lavender or whale-songs music here. Good ol' epsom salts provide exfoliation, along with a relaxing soak. The oils in this scrub start with arnica-infused olive oil, to which we add sweet almond oil, shea butter, and coconut oil. Arnica has a long history of use to help soothe muscles and reduce inflammation, while this combination of oils moisturize and soften skin. Also includes carnauba wax as a thickener, and vitamin E as an antioxidant.

To use, first wet your skin. With a dry hand scoop out some scrub and rub it on your skin in a circular motion. Let the scrub sit for a couple minutes, then soak or rinse off in warm water. Polysorbate, an emulsifier, is included as an ingredient to help rinse the excess oils from your skin, so you will feel soft but not slimy.

Foot and Body Scrub is scented with cinnamon and cedar essential oils, which are both masculine scents and beneficial for removing funky smells from your skin. 

Not just for feet, you can also use Foot and Body Scrub all over to help exfoliate, moisturize, remove unpleasant odors, and soothe sore muscles.

4 oz of scrub will come packaged in an attractive amber PET jar. For external use only. Please use common sense - don't apply to open skin, use clean hands, and discontinue use if any irritation occurs. This product has not been evaluated by the FDA and is not designed to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
